fullText: Dan Lauria delivers a powerhouse performance as the legendary Green Bay Packers coach in this engaging biographical play that scores big with both sports fans and theater lovers.
dtliExcerpt: Dan Lauria delivers a powerhouse performance as the legendary Green Bay Packers coach in this engaging biographical play that scores big with both sports fans and theater lovers.
